thread.title: Excellent place and excellent staff treatment
thread.title_full: Excellent place and excellent staff treatment - Review of Villa des Ambassadeurs, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: joaqsarrion
title: Excellent place and excellent staff treatment
text:
I spend two days in this hotel in a recent business travel to Paris. The room is very confortable. The Hotel is small -something that you appreciate if you like a peaceful enviroment- situated in a very good place to visit Paris. It is lovely ant the staff very friendly. Breakfast has the essentials, and you have a kitchen to use during the breakfast to prepare an egg passed by water.
I would recommend it to visit Paris.
Room Tip: Best place, friendly staff See more room tips
